snippet: An avowed atheist, Albert Saber was initially accused of circulating links to an offensive online video lampooning the Prophet Mohamed that set off protests in September.
lead_paragraph: An avowed atheist, Albert Saber was initially accused of circulating links to an offensive online video lampooning the Prophet Mohamed that set off protests in September.

headline.seo: Cairo Court Sentences Man to 3 Years for Insulting Religion
headline.main: Cairo Court Sentences Man to 3 Years for Insulting Religion
headline.print_headline: Cairo Court Sentences Man to 3 Years for Insulting Religion
